alert.note: Alert for Alfalfa; Grant (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 9:20PM CDT until May 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Alfalfa County in northwestern Oklahoma... West central Grant County in northern Oklahoma... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 920 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Wakita, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Alfalfa and west central Grant Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
